sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { fnGetDateInfo, fnTimer } from '../../js/dday'; import { DDayContext } from './CompDday'; const CompListItem = ({ item }) => { const [_remainDays, _setRemainDays] = useState(0) const [_remainHours, _setRemainHours] = useState(0) const [_remainMinutes, _setRemainMinutes] = useState(0) const [_remainSeconds, _setRemainSeconds] = useState(0) const [_stroke1, _setStroke1] = useState(300) const [_stroke2, _setStroke2] = useState(24) const [_stroke3, _setStroke3] = useState(60) const [_stroke4, _setStroke4] = useState(60) const [_isActive, _setIsActive] = useState('') const [_isDeActive, _setIsDeActive] = useState('deactive') const { id,title, Dday } = item//item이란 props로 내려받은 객체{id, Dday}를 구조분해 const { day, year, month, date, ap, hour, min, sec, timeStamp } = fnGetDateInfo(Dday) const {_ddayArr, _setDdayArr, _ddayOutputArr, _setDdayOutputArr} = useContext(DDayContext) const fnTimerSetState = function () { let { remainDays, remainHours, remainMinutes, remainSecs } = fnTimer(timeStamp) /* 함수로 받아온 시간 */ /* 얼마나 남았는지 초로 알려주는 것 */ _setRemainDays(remainDays) _setRemainHours(remainHours) _setRemainMinutes(remainMinutes) _setRemainSeconds(remainSecs) _setStroke1(remainDays) _setStroke2(remainHours) _setStroke3(remainMinutes) _setStroke4(remainSecs) } // fnTimerSetState const fnMouseDownHandler = function () { _setIsActive(`active`) } //fnMouseDownHandler const fnDelHandler = function () { if (window.confirm('D-day목록을 삭제하시겠습니까?')) { // 예를 누르면 const ddayArr = _ddayArr.filter(v=>v.id !== id) _setDdayArr(ddayArr) // ddayArr 는 다음 화면에 바뀐다. _setDdayOutputArr(ddayArr) localStorage.setItem('ddayArrStorage',JSON.stringify(ddayArr)) } else { // 아니오를 누르면 _setIsActive(' ') // active없애기 } } useEffect(() => { fnTimerSetState() let interverID interverID = setInterval(() => { fnTimerSetState() }, 1000) return (() => { clearInterval(interverID) }) }) // useEffect return (

  • {title}

    {year}- {month}- {date}- {day} {ap} {hour}: {min}: {sec}

    • day 0 ~ 300

    • Hour 0 ~ 24

    • Min 0 ~ 60

    • Sec 0 ~ 60

    • ); }; export default CompListItem;
